title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Mike Prokosch and he is the coordinator of the New Priorities Network – a national grassroots movement... <!--more--> to fund jobs and services by the ending the wars in the middle east and by cutting the Pentagon’s budget.
Mike became active in the anti-war movement during the Vietnam era and has since worked as a newspaper reporter editor and as an activist in a variety of organizations opposing American intervention and various countries.
